metadata.name: Zen Garden ~ 01
metadata.description:
Sand: Vanilla
Rake: Wood
Pattern: 4x2 circular

~

A limited collection of contemporary works based on the Japanese 枯山水 karesansui, or dry garden – known in the west as 'zen gardens'.

Each piece in the collection is unique, featuring variations in sand color and 'rake' material, with each garden raked in one of four perfectly looped patterns.

~

2160x2160px
30 fps
